page.title: 08Scaring the birds.
page.content: "Sole Concessionaire" runs the proud boast of the Exid firm run by Grant and Carter providing a service and supply of gas bird scarers of several kinds. Made in Belgium,the bird scarers are imported here and supplied via 1000 agents to clients on farms all over the country. Parcels go out of the little factory to Canada,Australia New Zealand and many other countries. The scarers are gas-operated and cost about Â£150 each. Propane gas is used to ensure an efficient machine and the firm guarantee 100% sucess especially with the "multibang" scarer which fools the birds completely. The most expensive scarer fires off in a different direction each time. Sometimes, scarers have to be returned for repair, possibly after catching fire.
